verses.verse: My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1747>rests<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3444>alone.<s%> My salvation is from him.
He alone is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> my <S%H4869>fortress<s%>â€” I will never be <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>

How long will you <S%H2050>assault<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> would all of you throw him <S%H7523>down,<s%> Like a <S%H5186>leaning<s%> <S%H7023>wall,<s%> like a <S%H1760>tottering<s%> <S%H1447>fence?<s%>

They fully <S%H3289>intend<s%> to throw him <S%H5080>down<s%> from his <S%H7613>lofty<s%> <S%H7521>place.<s%> They delight in <S%H3577>lies.<s%> They <S%H1288>bless<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> but they <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H7130>inwardly.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H1826>wait<s%> in silence for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8615>alone,<s%> for my expectation is from him.
He alone is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> my <S%H4869>fortress.<s%> I will not be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
With <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> and my <S%H3519>honor.<s%> The <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> is in <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H982>Trust<s%> in him at all <S%H6256>times,<s%> you <S%H5971>people.<s%> Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>him.<s%> God is a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for <S%H5542>us.<s%> Selah.

Surely <S%H120>men<s%> of low degree are just a <S%H1892>breath,<s%> and <S%H376>men<s%> of high degree are a <S%H3577>lie.<s%> <S%H5927>In<s%> the <S%H3976>balances<s%> they will go <S%H3162>up.<s%> They are together lighter than a <S%H1892>breath.<s%>

<S%H982>Don't<s%> trust in <S%H6233>oppression.<s%> <S%H1891>Don't<s%> become vain in <S%H1498>robbery.<s%> If <S%H2428>riches<s%> <S%H5107>increase,<s%> <S%H7896>don't<s%> set your heart on <S%H3820>them.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H259>once;<s%> <S%H8147>twice<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2098>this,<s%> that <S%H5797>power<s%> belongs to <S%H430>God.<s%>
Also to <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord, belongs loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> for you <S%H7999>reward<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H4639>work.<s%>
